ext.hybridauth.desc: Hybrid authentication and authorization against external resources
ext.hybridauth.configuration-error: Domain configuration error. Please contact your system administrator.
ext.hybridauth.authentication.credential: Could not authenticate credentials against domain "$1".
ext.hybridauth.authentication.userinfo-e: Could not fetch required user info to complete login.
ext.hybridauth.map.not-linking: Found local user, but can not verify match. Please login locally and match your attributes, or register a new user with matching attributes.
ext.hybridauth.map.not-creating: Could not find local user to map to and creation is disabled.
apihelp-ext.hybridauth.unlink-extended-d: This API can be called to unlink the provider <-> MediaWiki user mapping for a given provider user.
